global.title: Ruling
global.about_text:
«Ruling» allows gamemaster groups to find and compile a template for their project rules. How does it work? Please, fill the survey below and click on the «Generate» button. You will get the result immediately.

We're trying to include as many rule models to «Ruling» as possible and if you're willing to help, you can: : 1) send us a missing model; 2) read through and comment models presented; 3) propose your own question or answer in a present one for the generator.
global.injection: The model «%s» will be shown here if %s.
global.answer_to_question: the answer «%s» is given to the question «%s»
global.will_be_shown: The model will be shown in generator if:
